Title: Double Fold.
Subtitle: Libraries and the Assault on Paper.
Authors: Nicholson Baker.

Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=TvLgmAEACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Describes how libraries across the United States have dismantled collections of original bound newspapers and brittle books to replace them with microfilmed copies, exploring the hidden reasons for such policies..
